trans-unit.source: Configuration file recursion exceeded maximum allowed depth of {0}.
trans-unit.target: 구성 파일 재귀가 허용되는 최대 깊이 {0}을(를) 초과했습니다.

trans-unit.source: Error reading git repository information: {0}
trans-unit.target: Git 리포지토리 정보를 읽는 동안 오류가 발생했습니다. {0}

trans-unit.source: The format of the file '{0}' is invalid.
Home relative paths are not allowed when {0} is '{1}': '{2}'.
trans-unit.target: {0}이(가) '{1}': '{2}'인 경우에는 홈 상대 경로를 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Repository does not have a working directory.
Invalid module path: '{0}'.
Invalid reference: '{0}'.
The URL of repository remote '{0}' is invalid: '{1}'.
The path of submodule '{0}' is missing or invalid: '{1}'.
The URL of submodule '{0}' is missing or invalid: '{1}'.
Path must be absolute.
Path must be a file path.
Path specified in file '{0}' is invalid: '{1}'.
Path specified in file '{0}' is not absolute: '{1}'.
trans-unit.target: '{0}' 파일에 지정된 경로는 절대 경로가 아닙니다. '{1}'

trans-unit.source: Recursion detected while resolving reference: '{0}'.
Repository '{0}' does not have the specified remote '{1}'; using '{2}' instead.
trans-unit.target: Repository '{0}' does not have the specified remote '{1}'; using '{2}' instead.

trans-unit.source: Repository does not have a working directory.
Repository '{0}' has no remote.
Repository has no commit.
Repository URL evaluation exceeded maximum allowed depth of {0} local repositories.
trans-unit.target: Repository URL evaluation exceeded maximum allowed depth of {0} local repositories.

trans-unit.source: {0} The source code won't be available via Source Link.
trans-unit.target: {0} 소스 링크를 통해 소스 코드를 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Submodule '{0}' doesn't have any commit.
Unable to locate repository with working directory that contains directory '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: 디렉터리 '{0}'이(가) 포함된 작업 디렉터리로 리포지토리를 찾을 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Unsupported repository version {0}. Only versions up to {1} are supported.
trans-unit.target: {0}은(는) 지원되지 않는 리포지토리 버전입니다. 버전은 최대 {1}까지만 지원됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of {0} is not a valid configuration scope: '{1}'.
The value of {0} is not a valid path: '{1}'.
